name: (C) Ref. Case RTU, Other Fossil Heat
_description: Ref. case oil furnace integrated in packaged rooftop unit plus ventilation

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Typical value for performance, converted to Scout units where necessary.
energy_efficiency_source.source_data: Buildings Annual Technology Baseline. NREL, forthcoming

installed_cost_source.notes: Typical efficiency costs in 2023, normalized by capacity
installed_cost_source.source_data: Buildings Annual Technology Baseline. NREL, forthcoming

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of typical commercial RTU lifetime

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiple of 79% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane packaged unit (961852 sf) by square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane furnace or packaged unit (4543002 sf). Cooling equipment multiples determined by square feet in which given cooling system (e.g., RTAC, chiller) is pared with given heating system for the measure. Ventilation multiples determined by square feet in which given ventilation system (VAV or CAV) is paired with given heating system for the measure.
